# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

N = int(input())

change = 1000 - (N % 1000) if N % 1000 != 0 else 0

print(change)
import sys
N = int(input())
num_of_bills = N // 1000
change = 1000 * num_of_bills - N
print(change)
